pages.text: The $(d)Imbuing Station$() is used to craft $(l:items/imbue_fire)Imbues$(/l).$(br2)Ingredients that go in the outer slots can go in any outer slot, but the center ingredient must go in the center slot.
pages.title: Imbuing Station

pages.text: For automation, the center slot can be accessed from the top face, the other input slots can be accessed from the sides, and the output slot can be accessed from the bottom.
